definitions.definition: (collective) A mixture of solid and liquid food scraps fed to pigs etc; especially kitchen waste for this purpose.
(by extension) Any disgusting or distasteful liquid.
definitions.example: I cannot believe anyone could drink this swill.
This new TV show is a worthless load of swill.

definitions.definition: A large quantity of liquid drunk at one swallow.
definitions.example: He took a swill of his drink and tried to think of words.

definitions.definition: To drink (or, rarely, eat) greedily or to excess.
To wash (something) by flooding with water.
To move (a liquid or liquid-filled vessel) in a circular motion.
(of a liquid) To move around or over a surface.
To inebriate; to fill with drink.
